attributes.action: Stronger penalties for people who park/stop on yellow school crossings
attributes.background: It's very dangerous situation as my local school has been a few close Misses with people doing u turn And parking on yellow zigzags plus  with school children have to walk round parked stops cars in the road sooner or later someone will be seriously hurt a lot of people don't care about others

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Road markings and parking enforcement on local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
